import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./Banner.css"; import { Carousel } from "react-bootstrap"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useEffect } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import parse from 'html-react-parser'; function Banner() { const [typeProduct, setTypeProduct] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { axios .get("http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/getAllTypeProduct") .then((response) => { setTypeProduct(response.data); // console.log(typeof(response.data[0].icon)) }); axios .get("http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/getAllTypeProduct") .then((response) => { setTypeProduct(response.data); // console.log(typeof(response.data[0].icon)) }); }, []); return ( <>
    {typeProduct.map((item, index)=>(
  1. {item.TenLoai}
    2. ))}
); } export default React.memo(Banner) ;
